snippet: The South and the North, viewed from the West.When men speak of the South and the North, at this day, ten to one they are discussing the subject of slavery, or talking about some of the complicated questions connected with slavery....
lead_paragraph: The South and the North, viewed from the West.When men speak of the South and the North, at this day, ten to one they are discussing the subject of slavery, or talking about some of the complicated questions connected with slavery.
